content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help you schedule a plumbing service. May I have your full name, please?
Thanks, John! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to service your location?
Thank you, John. Let me just verify that address for you.
I'm sorry, John, it seems I am unable to process the address you provided. Could you please confirm your full address including city and zip code?
Sure, it's 123 Elm St, Springfield, but I don't have the zip code right now.

Thanks for that information. Unfortunately, I still can't verify your location without a complete address including zip code. Without it, I can't confirm if we service your area. Is there another way I can help?
